languages.text: "Чудо или авария? Сам подумай, ну откуда на станции взяться роднику? Наверяка это просто трубу прорвало! Согласись, не очень хотелось бы наглотаться сточной воды и концы отдать".

traits.locale_text: "Чудо или авария? Вдруг это просто трубу прорвало? Не очень хотелось бы наглотаться сточной воды и концы отдать".

languages.text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"
languages.original_text: "Чудо или авария? Сам подумай, ну откуда на станции взяться роднику? Наверяка это просто трубу прорвало! Согласись, не очень хотелось бы наглотаться сточной воды и концы отдать".

traits.locale_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best way to go?"
"A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best way to go?"
"A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best way to go?"
"A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best way to go?"
"A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"
"A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

languages.text: “是奇迹，还是意外？好好动脑子想想，这座星站上怎么可能有泉水呢？说不定只是水管爆了！你真的觉得喝上一桶污水会对你有好处吗？”
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: “是奇迹，还是意外？好好动脑子想想，这座星站怎么会有泉水呢？说不定只是水管爆了！你不觉得，这所谓的奇迹，和直接喝上一桶污水根本没有区别吗？”

languages.text: 「奇跡なのか災害なのか…もう一度よく考えてみろ。ステーションの水は何処から来ている？破裂したパイプからだろう！下水をバケツ一杯飲むのが良いと思っているのか？」
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: 「奇跡なのか災害なのかーーもう一度よく考えてみろ。ステーションの水は何処から来ている？破裂したパイプからだろう！下水の水をバケツ一杯飲むのが良いと思っているのか？」

languages.text: «¿Un milagro... o una desgracia? Piénselo. ¿Cómo se consigue un manantial de agua en una estación? ¡Probablemente se haya roto alguna tubería! ¿No le parece que beberse un cubo lleno de aguas residuales no es la mejor idea?».
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Un milagro... o una desgracia? Piénselo. ¿Cómo se consigue un manantial de agua en una estación? ¡Probablemente se haya roto alguna tubería! ¿No le parece que beberse un cubo lleno de aguas residuales no es la mejor manera de irse?».

languages.text: "Ein Wunder ... oder ein Fehler? Denkt mal darüber nach. Wo soll auf einer Station ein natürlicher Brunnen herkommen? Das ist sicher nur ein geplatztes Rohr! Ich weiß nicht, ob es ein sonderlich guter Einfall ist, einen Eimer Kanalwasser zu trinken."
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Wunder ... oder ein Fehler? Denkt mal darüber nach. Wo soll auf einer Station ein natürlicher Brunnen herkommen? Das ist sicher nur ein geplatztes Rohr! Ich weiß nicht, ob es der angenehmste Tod ist, einen Eimer Kanalwasser zu trinken."

languages.text: « Un miracle... ou un incident ? Réfléchissez un peu. Une source d'eau naturelle sur une station ? Ça vient probablement d'une canalisation qui fuit ! Franchement, je doute que boire des litres d'eaux usées soit une bonne idée. »
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: « Un miracle... ou un incident ? Réfléchissez un peu. Une source d'eau naturelle sur une station ? Ça vient probablement d'une canalisation qui fuit ! Et franchement, je doute que boire des litres d'eaux usées soit une bonne idée. »

languages.text: "Bir mucize mi yoksa bir kaza mı? Düşün bir. Bir istasyonda su pınarı nasıl olabiliyor? Muhtemelen patlamış bir borudur alt tarafı! Lağım suyunu kova kova içmek pek de müthiş bir fikir olmayabilir, yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "A miracle — or a mishap? Think about it. How do you get a spring of water on a station? It's probably just a burst pipe! Don't you think drinking a bucketful of sewage isn't the best idea?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir mucize mi, yoksa bir kaza mı? Düşün bir. Bir istasyonda su pınarı nasıl olabiliyor? Muhtemelen patlamış bir borudur alt tarafı! Lağım suyunu kova kova içmek pek de müthiş bir fikir olmayabilir, yanılıyor muyum?"
